Episodes.Title: What If... Captain Carter Were the First Avenger?
Episodes.Actors: Jeffrey Wright, Hayley Atwell, Josh Keaton
Episodes.Plot: When Steve Rogers is seriously injured, Peggy Carter becomes the world's first super soldier.

Episodes.Title: What If... T'Challa Became a Star-Lord?
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Chauncey, Steve Gerber, Jack Kirby
Episodes.Actors: Jeffrey Wright, Chadwick Boseman, Karen Gillan
Episodes.Plot: The rough-and-tumble space pirates known as the Ravagers abduct T'Challa instead of Peter Quill.

Episodes.Title: What If... The World Lost Its Mightiest Heroes?
Episodes.Writer: A.C. Bradley, Matthew Chauncey, Jack Kirby
Episodes.Actors: Jeffrey Wright, Samuel L. Jackson, Michael Douglas
Episodes.Plot: Nick Fury struggles to launch The Avengers when candidates are targeted by a serial killer.

Episodes.Title: What If... Doctor Strange Lost His Heart Instead of His Hands?
Episodes.Writer: A.C. Bradley, Jack Kirby, Joe Simon
Episodes.Actors: Jeffrey Wright, Benedict Cumberbatch, Rachel McAdams
Episodes.Plot: A grief-stricken Doctor Strange uses the Eye of Agamotto in a dangerous effort to change the past.

Episodes.Title: What If... Zombies?!
Episodes.Writer: A.C. Bradley, Matthew Chauncey, Jack Kirby
Episodes.Actors: Jeffrey Wright, Mark Ruffalo, Chadwick Boseman
Episodes.Plot: When The Avengers are infected by a zombie plague, surviving heroes search for a cure.

Episodes.Title: What If... Killmonger Rescued Tony Stark?
Episodes.Actors: Jeffrey Wright, Michael B. Jordan, Jon Favreau
Episodes.Plot: Killmonger rescues Tony Stark when his Humvee is attacked in Afghanistan and manipulates his influence for his designs of conquering Wakanda.

Episodes.Title: What If... Thor Were an Only Child?
Episodes.Writer: A.C. Bradley, Matthew Chauncey, Steve Gerber
Episodes.Actors: Jeffrey Wright, Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman
Episodes.Plot: Thor, who never learned to be a good hero, throws an out-of-control intergalactic party on Earth.

Episodes.Title: What If... Ultron Won?
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Chauncey, Jack Kirby, Joe Simon
Episodes.Actors: Jeffrey Wright, Jeremy Renner, Benedict Cumberbatch
Episodes.Plot: Natasha Romanoff and Clint Barton seek to destroy killer-robot Ultron following a cataclysmic event.

Episodes.Title: What If... The Watcher Broke His Oath?
Episodes.Writer: A.C. Bradley, Matthew Chauncey, Steve Englehart
Episodes.Actors: Jeffrey Wright, Samuel L. Jackson, Hayley Atwell
Episodes.Plot: The Watcher gathers heroes from across the multiverse for one final battle against Infinity Ultron.
